verbose_text: The apoptosis gene ced-3 and the nuclear hormone receptor nhr-49, which is an NHF4-alpha homolog responsible for mediating fatty acid oxidation and gluconeogenesis during starvation, promoted germline remodeling in starvation induced ARD.
evidence: nuclear hormone receptor nhr-49, which is an NHF4-alpha homolog responsible for mediating fatty acid oxidation and gluconeogenesis during starvation                           , promoted germline remodeling in starvation-induced ARD
